title: Danette May's Famous Gluten-Free Fat-Burning Chocolate Chip Cookie
directions: Danette May's Famous Gluten-Free Fat-Burning Chocolate Chip Cookie
ingredients: 2 eggs (or substitute 4 Tbsp. chia seeds for 1 egg)
1/2 tsp. salt (only add the salt if you are using unsalted almond butter)
1/2 cup dark chocolate chips (70% or higher cocoa)
